channel.title: Death Stranding Lore – Points of Interest
channel.description: A curated feed of lore, symbolism, and behind-the-scenes trivia from Death Stranding.

item.title: 1. Timefall isn’t just rain — it accelerates time for anything it touches.
item.description: 1. Timefall isn’t just rain — it accelerates time for anything it touches.

item.title: 2. BTs (Beached Things) are souls stranded between life and death.
item.description: 2. BTs (Beached Things) are souls stranded between life and death.

item.title: 3. DOOMS is a mysterious condition that lets people sense or interact with the dead.
item.description: 3. DOOMS is a mysterious condition that lets people sense or interact with the dead.

item.title: 4. Bridge Babies (BBs) are harvested from brain-dead mothers.
item.description: 4. Bridge Babies (BBs) are harvested from brain-dead mothers.

item.title: 5. The “Death Stranding” event blurred the worlds of the living and the dead.
item.description: 5. The “Death Stranding” event blurred the worlds of the living and the dead.

item.title: 6. Delivering packages = restoring human connection.
item.description: 6. Delivering packages = restoring human connection.

item.title: 7. Sam’s handprints on his body symbolize the people he’s lost.
item.description: 7. Sam’s handprints on his body symbolize the people he’s lost.

item.title: 8. BB is named Louise — Sam’s daughter.
item.description: 8. BB is named Louise — Sam’s daughter.

item.title: 9. The beach is a metaphor for limbo, a personal afterlife.
item.description: 9. The beach is a metaphor for limbo, a personal afterlife.

item.title: 10. The name 'Bridges' isn't subtle — you’re literally building bridges.
item.description: 10. The name 'Bridges' isn't subtle — you’re literally building bridges.

item.title: 11. Norman Reedus didn’t know what the game was about during filming.
item.description: 11. Norman Reedus didn’t know what the game was about during filming.

item.title: 12. Sam peeing was one of the first mocap scenes — Kojima insisted on it.
item.description: 12. Sam peeing was one of the first mocap scenes — Kojima insisted on it.

item.title: 13. BB’s pod was inspired by hospital NICUs — eerie and intimate.
item.description: 13. BB’s pod was inspired by hospital NICUs — eerie and intimate.

item.title: 14. The 'Low Roar' soundtrack was discovered by Kojima in Iceland.
item.description: 14. The 'Low Roar' soundtrack was discovered by Kojima in Iceland.

item.title: 15. Mocap suits had real-time facial and body feedback.
item.description: 15. Mocap suits had real-time facial and body feedback.

item.title: 16. You can drink six cans of Monster Energy in your private room.
item.description: 16. You can drink six cans of Monster Energy in your private room.

item.title: 17. If you spin the camera around Sam while resting, he flips you off.
item.description: 17. If you spin the camera around Sam while resting, he flips you off.

item.title: 18. Higgs licks BB’s pod like it’s a popsicle — you can't unsee it.
item.description: 18. Higgs licks BB’s pod like it’s a popsicle — you can't unsee it.

item.title: 19. Sam’s codename echoes 'Jack' and 'John' — MGS parallels.
